session.code:
**Functional Purpose**: Tab title for the code panel in a mentoring session.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session UI (right-hand panel tabs)
**When Users See This**: When viewing a mentoring session on a mobile or narrow screen.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Code"
